item.title: The Lab Kodi Addon [KodiTricks]
item.description:
The Lab Kodi Addon [install Step-By-Step]

Lab Kodi Addon Lab Kodi Addon is a complete addon that is located in The Lab Repository. It comes with a variety of categories and sections to select from. The categories comprise Movies and Television Shows, New Movies, New Episodes, 1-Click Movies, IPTV & Sports, and numerous others. The Lab has a playlist that can be played with one-click content, but it also can search for video sources. It is important to note that a service such as Real Debrid is highly recommended for use with this, as well as other add-ons.

In the guide below, we walk you through step-by-step instructions on how to install the Lab Kodi Addon.

Sections Overview

  • Films
  • Television Shows
  • My Movies
  • My Television Shows
  • News Movies
  • New Episodes
  • NEW VERSIONS of NightWing 1.
  • 1 Click Movies and TV Shows
  • 1 Click Movies
  • The Lab User TV and Movie Lists
  • IPTV & Sports
  • Retro Cartoons
  • Documentaries
  • Stand-up Comedy
  • People
  • Tools
  • Search

Attention: Protect Your Privacy Online

Be aware that streaming videos may be prohibited in your specific country. Online privacy protection is becoming more essential. We suggest using the use of a VPN. A VPN safeguards your online activity and prevents your service provider and other authorities from scrutinizing your online activities.

Through the use of a VPN, you can also alter your address so that you can gain access to services not available at the place you reside.

We suggest using the most reliable Kodi VPN for 2024.

  • ProtonVPN: The most efficient way to increase your speed.
  • Access VPN for Privacy Access VPN: The best choice for those with a tight budget.
  • Surfshark VPN: Great for usability.
  • NordVPN: Best for average speeds.
  • CyberGhost VPN is the best VPN for a long trial period.

Koditricks.com is not associated with the creators of Kodi addons. We have no control over the contents of Kodi addons, nor do we recommend that our users take action against copyright violations.

How do you install The Lab Kodi Addon?

Install the Lab Repository

  1. You may have to make sure that you enable sources from unidentified sources to be available in the Kodi settings.
  2. Enter Your Kodi settings and then open the file manager.
  3. Choose “Add Source” and then click “None.”
  4. Type in the path “https://th3l48.github.io/TheLab/" and select “Done”
  5. Click on the box to highlight it and then type in an appropriate name, such as “TheLab,” for this media source.
  6. Click “OK.”
  7. Return to the main menu, and then select “Addons” on the left-hand side.
  8. Start the browser for add-ons by clicking on the small box symbol on the upper left
  9. Choose “Install from the ZIP file.”
  10. Respond to the warning message with “Yes.”
  11. Open the source “TheLab” and select the file “repository.thelab-x.x.x.zip.”
  12. Then, wait until a message appears that the repository was installed successfully.

If you’re not sure what to do to install the Kodi add-on, look up our tutorial including pictures.

Setup The Lab Kodi Addon

  1. In your browser, for add-ons, click “Install using repository.”
  2. Choose the one that is installed, “The Lab Repository.”
  3. Navigate to the category “Video add-ons”
  4. Select the Lab and then click “Install” on the right side.
  5. Verify the installation of dependencies by choosing “OK.”
  6. It would help if you waited until you saw a notification that indicates the Kodi addon has been installed successfully.
  7. Go back to the menu, and the Kodi addon will be available via the main menu.

The Lab: ScreenShots

  • The Lab Kodi Addon Main Menu
  • the lab Movies Section
  • The lab TV Shows Section
